# -*- CMakeLists.txt generated by CodeLite IDE. Do not edit by hand -*-

cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 2.8.11)

# Project name
project(LongUI)

# This setting is useful for providing JSON file used by CodeLite for code completion
set(CMAKE_EXPORT_COMPILE_COMMANDS 1)

set(CONFIGURATION_NAME "Debug")

set(CL_WORKSPACE_DIRECTORY .)
# Set default locations
set(CL_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/${CL_WORKSPACE_DIRECTORY}/cmake-build-${CONFIGURATION_NAME}/output)
set(CMAKE_LIBRARY_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY ${CL_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY})
set(CMAKE_RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY ${CL_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY})
set(CMAKE_ARCHIVE_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY ${CL_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY})

# Projects


# Top project
# Define some variables
set(PROJECT_LongUI_PATH "${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}")
set(WORKSPACE_PATH "${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/")

include_directories(
    .
    .
    ../include/

)


# Compiler options
add_definitions(-g)
add_definitions(-O0)
add_definitions(-std=c++14)
add_definitions(-Wall)
add_definitions(-m32)
add_definitions(-std=c99)
add_definitions(
    -D_WIN32_WINNT=0x0603
    -DLUI_NO_ACCESSIBLE
    -DLUI_NO_DXGIDEBUG
)


# Linker options
set(LINK_OPTIONS -m32)


if(WIN32)
    # Resource options
endif(WIN32)

# Library path
link_directories(
    .
)

set_source_files_properties(
    ${CXX_SRCS} PROPERTIES COMPILE_FLAGS 
    " -g -O0 -std=c++14 -Wall -m32")

set_source_files_properties(
    ${C_SRCS} PROPERTIES COMPILE_FLAGS 
    " -g -O0 -std=c99 -Wall -m32")

if(WIN32)
    enable_language(RC)
    set(CMAKE_RC_COMPILE_OBJECT
        "<CMAKE_RC_COMPILER> ${RC_OPTIONS} -O coff -i <SOURCE> -o <OBJECT>")
endif(WIN32)



#{{{{ User Code 2
# Place your code here
#}}}}

add_executable(LongUI ${RC_SRCS} ${CXX_SRCS} ${C_SRCS})
target_link_libraries(LongUI ${LINK_OPTIONS})

target_link_libraries(LongUI
    Gdi32
    dxguid
    d2d1
    Winmm
    Ole32
    Dbghelp
    uuid
    Dwrite
    d3d11
    DXGI
    windowscodecs
    imm32
)
